contents.name: Overview
contents.content:
At Wrace we believe your accommodation should be more than just a room. This is why we ensure we provide facilities to ensure you can live, study, socialize and enjoy your stay.

In addition, the property features its own reception area and maintenance service, in case any assistance is required. Your safety is extremely important to us, and so all of our sites are fitted with CCTV and secure entry systems. We also employ our own fully-trained accommodation team during office opening times, in case any issues arise or you have any queries.

contents.name: Facilities
contents.content:
Executive room features a study space and ample storage space
Attached bathroom
2. A double bed & 2 nightstands
3. Single comfy chair
4. Double wardrobe
5. TV with DSTV subscription

contents.name: Extras
contents.content:
Amenities:
1. Kitchen & Dining area
2. Lounge
3. Laundry Room
4. Gym
5. Study Area

Rent Includes:
1. Electricity
2. Wi-Fi
3. DSTV
4. Water
5. Transportation
6. Laundry

Safety and Security:
1. CCTV Surveillance
2. Armed Security Guards
